prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon that resembles a rhinoceros with armored skin.
I want a Pokemon that is sturdy and can charge through obstacles like a tank.
Generate a Pokemon with strong legs, perfect for running and climbing rocky terrains.
Make a Pokemon that could blend well in both mountainous and desert habitats.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a tough exterior and a gentle personality hidden within.
Design a Pokemon that has spikes and a bulky shape, ideal for defense.
Show me a Pokemon that would be a fierce competitor in ground-type battles.
